name: swarmbot
author: CoMakery
description: A bot for Dynamic Equity Organizations running in Slack

scripts.fulltest: npm run testv && npm run lint && bin/code-checks
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-staging && npm run deploy-production
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run pre-push && npm version patch && git push --tags origin head && git branch --force staging HEAD && git push --force origin staging:staging && bin/deploy --target staging
scripts.deploy-production: git fetch && git branch --force production origin/staging && git push --force origin production:production && bin/deploy --target production
scripts.shipit: npm run pre-push && git push --tags origin head
scripts.pre-push: npm run check-clean && npm run fulltest
scripts.check-clean:
if [[ $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then echo '*** Please stash or commit changes first ***
' && exit 1; fi
